languages.text: "Ах да... Если вас интересует весьма выгодное предложение, способное укрепить протекторат фон Валанциус... Пожалуй, прямо сейчас недосуг думать о подобных вещах, но вот когда мы вернемся на ваш корабль... Возможно, у вас найдется время поговорить, шерин?"

traits.locale_text: "Ах да... Если вас интересует весьма выгодное предложение, способное укрепить торговую империю фон Валанциус, мне есть, что вам предложить. Пожалуй, прямо сейчас недосуг думать о подобных вещах, но вот когда мы вернемся на ваш корабль... Возможно, у вас найдется время поговорить, шерин?"

languages.text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"
languages.original_text: "Ах да... Если вас интересует весьма выгодное предложение, способное укрепить протекторат фон Валанциус... Пожалуй, прямо сейчас недосуг думать о подобных вещах, но вот когда мы вернемся на ваш корабль... Возможно, у вас найдется время поговорить, шерин?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius trade empire a leg up, I have something I can entice you with. I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

"Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius trade empire a leg up, I have something I can entice you with. I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

"Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius trade empire a leg up, I have something I can entice you with. I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

"Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius trade empire a leg up, I have something I can entice you with. I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

"Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

languages.text: “噢，还有件事情……不知你是否对某个相当有利可图的提议感兴趣？这个提议会为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地带来利益……现在恐怕并不太适合讨论这种事情，不过等咱们回到你的船上之后……或许你愿意抽出些时间和我聊聊，亲爱的？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，还有件事情……不知你是否对某个相当有利可图的提议感兴趣？这个提议会为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地带来利益……现在恐怕并不太适合讨论这种事情，不过等咱们回到你的船上之后……或许你愿意抽出些时间和我聊聊，亲爱的？”

languages.text: «Ah, y una cosa más... Si te interesa una oferta suculenta, una que pueda darle cierta ventaja al protectorado von Valancius... diría que ahora no es el momento de pensar en esas cosas, pero en cuanto volvamos a la nave... quizá te interese escucharme, shereen».
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, y una cosa más... Si te interesa una oferta suculenta, una que pueda darle cierta ventaja al protectorado von Valancius... diría que ahora no es el momento de pensar en esas cosas, pero en cuanto volvamos a la nave... quizá te interese escucharme, shereen».

languages.text: 「あぁ、あとひとつ…フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領に有利に働くおいしい提案に興味がある？今はそんなこと考えている場合じゃないだろうけど、船に戻ったらさ…少し時間をちょうだいよ、シャリーン？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、あとひとつ…フォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領に有利に働くおいしい提案に興味がある？今はそんなこと考えている場合じゃないだろうけど、船に戻ったらさ…少し時間をちょうだいよ、シャリーン？」

languages.text: "Ach, und eines noch ... falls Ihr an einem lukrativen Angebot interessiert seid, das dem Protektorat von Valancius einen Vorteil verschaffen kann ... dann ist zwar jetzt nicht der Zeitpunkt dafür, aber sobald wir wieder auf Eurem Schiff sind ... solltet Ihr vielleicht eine Minute für mich erübrigen, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: "Ach, und eines noch ... falls Ihr einem lukrativen Angebot interessiert seid, das dem Protektorat von Valancius einen Vorteil verschaffen kann ... dann ist zwar jetzt nicht der Zeitpunkt dafür, aber sobald wir wieder auf Eurem Schiff sind ... solltet Ihr vielleicht eine Minute für mich erübrigen, Shereen."

languages.text: « Oh, et une dernière chose... Si vous êtes {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par une offre plutôt lucrative, qui pourrait donner un avantage certain au protectorat von Valancius... Je dirais que ce n'est pas vraiment le moment, mais une fois de retour sur votre vaisseau... vous pourriez peut-être m'accorder une minute, shereen ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, et une dernière chose... Si vous êtes {mf|intéressé|intéressée} par une offre plutôt lucrative, qui pourrait donner un avantage certain au protectorat von Valancius... Je dirais que ce n'est pas vraiment le moment, mais une fois de retour sur votre vaisseau... vous pourriez peut-être m'accorder une minute, shereen ? »

languages.text: "Ha, bir şey daha diyecektim... Von Valancius protektorasına koltuk çıkacak kazançlı bir teklifle ilgilenirsen... Şu an böyle şeyleri düşünmenin ne yeri ne zamanı tabii. İşte gemine döndüğümüzde... Bir dakikanı ayırır mısın şirinim?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, and one more thing... If you're interested in a rather lucrative offer, one that can give the von Valancius protectorate a leg up... I'd say now isn't the time to be thinking about such things, but once we get back to your ship... perhaps you could spare me a minute, shereen?"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, bir şey daha diyecektim... Von Valancius protektorasına koltuk çıkacak kazançlı bir teklifle ilgileniyorsan... Şimdi böyle şeyleri düşünmenin zamanı değil tabii ama gemine geri döndüğümüzde... Bir dakikanı ayırır mısın şirinim?"
